name: Street Basketball (itch)
description:
Kinda low poly game made for Pxl game jam 4 in 24h.

The goal in the game is to score the highest possible number of points in 60 seconds. Points are given for hitting the basket and depend on the distance to the basket. 

Control:

W A S D - movement

Space - Stand up for a throw

E - choose force to throw

1.Take a ball

2. Press Space 

3. Press E at right timing

I hope you enjoy the game and leave a review.😉

Whats your best score here?

https://github.com/A1exdV/unity-basketball-gamejam
